long_description: Sized to fit 2 paddles up to 90 in. long, the Rareform Stand Up Paddle Bag is made from upcycled materials and features light padding for protection during transport. 0.25 in. padding throughout protects from dings, and a heavy duty corrosion-resistant zipper offers easy entry. Made from reused advertising billboard vinyl for high durability and unique styling. Please note that because this item is made of upcycled materials, each one is unique and specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Sized to fit 2 paddles up to 90 in. long, the Rareform Stand Up Paddle Bag is made from upcycled materials and features light padding for protection during transport.
